note: Dad and husband to three amazing people. Also, a co-author, former adjunct professor and software engineer.  I have experience in Smalltalk, Common Lisp, Clojure, Fennel, Swift, Java, C, C++, C#, Objective-C, Scala, F#, Typescript, Perl, Raku, Clojurescript, 6502 & 68000 assembly, Object Pascal, APL, Wolfram Language, and JavaScript and more. Lucky enough to have gotten an original Mac in Jan 1984, a NeXT Computer in 1988 and my own Lisp Machine. I’ve had dinner with Steve Jobs as well.

name: Languages
